content.raw:
I have removed code that searches for sdf file in 36f4ac8. AFAIK, `SerializedState` was added for Blueprint in PR #337, so all log files recorded using ign-gazebo2 should have it.

In a806d4a, the playback initializes the world using the first `SerialsedState` message, so the world should be loaded without having to hit the play button. This also fixes the failing test.
content.html:
I have removed code that searches for sdf file in 36f4ac8. AFAIK, SerializedState was added for Blueprint in PR #337, so all log files recorded using ign-gazebo2 should have it.

In a806d4a, the playback initializes the world using the first SerialsedState message, so the world should be loaded without having to hit the play button. This also fixes the failing test.
